name: UBUNTU APACHE2 PHP7.2
notes:
### Description

Installs and configures **Apache2** with **PHP 7.2** on **Ubuntu 16.04**. Writes a phpinfo file into **/var/www/html/phpinfo.php** which can be viewed at **http://server-ip-here/phpinfo.php**.

### Requirements

- Ubuntu 16.04
- Root account
content:
if [[ $EUID -ne 0 ]]; then
   echo "this script must be run as root" 1>&2;
   exit 1
fi

if [ ! -e /etc/os-release ] || [ $(awk -F= '/^NAME/{print $2}' /etc/os-release) != '"Ubuntu"' ]; then
  echo "this script must be run on Ubuntu" 1>&2;
  exit 1
fi

export DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive
export APT_LISTCHANGES_FRONTEND=none

apt-get update
apt -y autoremove

apt-get -y install software-properties-common python-software-properties apache2
systemctl enable apache2

add-apt-repository -y ppa:ondrej/php
apt-get update

apt-get -y install libapache2-mod-php7.2 php7.2-cli php7.2-common php7.2-curl \
                   php7.2-json php7.2-mbstring php7.2-intl php7.2-opcache \
                   php7.2-readline php7.2-soap php7.2-xml php7.2-zip \
                   php-gettext php-pear php7.2-mysql
                                                                                                
echo "<?php phpinfo(); ?>" > /var/www/html/phpinfo.php

service apache2 restart
